verifications.claim_description: Monitoring shows quarterly drift with PD AUC declining from 0.685 (Q1) to 0.679 (Q4) in 2015

evidence_found.evidence_text: Model monitoring aims to observe whether applicants' characteristics remain consistent over time...PSI was calculated for each variable.

verifications.verification_notes: Model monitoring via PSI is documented, but no quarterly AUC drift analysis showing decline from 0.685 to 0.679 was found in examined cells.

verifications.claim_description: Assumption: Economic environment stationary within 2007-2014 training period
verifications.verification_notes: The training period (2007-2014) is confirmed, but the assumption of economic stationarity is implicit rather than explicitly stated. The period includes the 2008 financial crisis, which contradicts true stationarity.

contradictions.description: 2007-2014 training period includes 2008 financial crisis, questioning stationarity assumption

verifications.claim_description: Assumption: No macroeconomic overlays; predictions assume sustained low-rate environment
verifications.verification_notes: No explicit macroeconomic variables or overlays were found in the feature set. The assumption of low-rate environment is implicit in the historical period but not explicitly documented.

verifications.claim_description: Assumption: Target population similar to training population (2015 backtesting confirms similarity)

evidence_found.evidence_text: PD Model was trained on loan data from 2007 to 2014. Now, one year has passed, and we will acquire loan data from 2015...investigate whether the distribution in the monitoring period (2015 loans, expected) significantly differs from the reference distribution (training data, actual) using the PSI

verifications.verification_notes: PSI monitoring of 2015 data confirms similarity assessment between training and monitoring populations. This validates the assumption that target population remains similar.

verifications.claim_description: Assumption: Only US Residents eligible (no territories); validated via address filters

evidence_found.evidence_text: addr_state analysis shows 50 US states plus DC

verifications.verification_notes: Address state data includes 50 US states + DC, confirming US residents. However, explicit exclusion of territories and validation filters were not found in examined cells.

verifications.claim_description: Assumption: Product features stable (36/60mo terms, unsecured, no prepayment penalties)

evidence_found.evidence_text: term variable shows 36 and 60 month loans
personal loans with 36 or 60 month terms

verifications.verification_notes: 36 and 60 month terms confirmed. 'Unsecured' nature implied for personal loans. No explicit evidence about prepayment penalties found.

verifications.claim_description: Assumption: Online distribution channels with stable underwriting criteria
verifications.verification_notes: LendingClub's peer-to-peer platform is confirmed as online distribution channel. However, explicit validation of 'stable underwriting criteria' is not documented.

verifications.claim_description: Assumption: Application-time data sufficient; no behavior/transaction data used

evidence_found.evidence_text: data available at the time of the application is considered an **application model.**

verifications.verification_notes: Application-time model confirmed. Data leakage variables explicitly removed to ensure only application-time data is used. No behavior/transaction data included.

verifications.claim_description: Assumption: Outcomes fully observable with no censoring over loan term

evidence_found.evidence_text: default variable created from loan_status categories including 'Charged Off', 'Late (31-120 days)', 'Default'

verifications.verification_notes: Default outcomes are observable through loan_status. However, explicit handling of censoring or discussion of outcome observability was not found in examined cells.

verifications.claim_description: Assumption: Self-reported fields (income, employment) accurate; no fraud overlay
verifications.verification_notes: Self-reported fields like annual_inc and emp_length are used in the model, but no explicit validation of accuracy or fraud detection was documented in examined cells.

verifications.claim_description: Assumption: PD, LGD, EAD modeled separately (no joint modeling of correlations)

evidence_found.evidence_text: LGD and EAD modeling in separate notebook, independent of PD
credit_policy_df['Expected Loss (EL)'] = credit_policy_df['Probability of Default (PD)'] * credit_policy_df['Exposure at Default (EAD)'] * credit_policy_df['Loss Given Default (LGD)']

verifications.verification_notes: PD, LGD, and EAD are modeled independently in separate notebooks. Final EL calculation multiplies the three components without joint modeling. This confirms the assumption of separate modeling.
